preguntas_originales.Pregunta: Is there a clause that allows the customer to terminate the contract early and/or with a certain notice?

Likewise, is there a clause that allows MAXAM to terminate the contract early and/or with a certain notice? 
Detail the implications of this (term, compensation, etc.).
Is there an exclusivity clause? Detail its content and implications.

Is there a purchase (or sale) clause of a minimum amount per year (or during the term of the contract)? 
Detail its content and communication procedure between the parties for this purpose.
In the case of sale of products by MAXAM, is it established or deduced that the product sold has a certain origin of production (country/region)?
Payment Term:
In the event of a delay or non-payment of an invoice, is there a duty of compensation to the other party?
What is the compensation percentage?
Does the contract have the option of offsetting invoices? In what cases?
If during the term of the contract new services are developed or in greater quantity and proportion than those described, is there an option to modify the rates?
Is there a clause to raise or lower rates (rise and fall) based on a certain index (for example, the nitrate index)? Has a cost-through been agreed?
Does the contract include the possibility of suspending the service or even terminating early in the event of non-payment of invoices? Detail its content: notice period, notification, etc.
Does the customer pay all the taxes involved in the subject matter of the contract?
When does the transfer of ownership of the products take place?
What is the Incoterm agreed by the parties?

Is there a subcontracting/assignment clause in the contract? 
Detail whether prior consent is required by the other party.
Is there a clause for termination of the contract or prior authorization by the counterparty in the event of a change of control of one of the parties?
Is there a clause in the contract that allows the customer/MAXAM to request a change from those employees who are not to their liking in a certain transaction?

Is there a liability or Liquidated Damages clause? 
Detail its contents, incorporating maximum limits of liability, where appropriate.
Are indirect and consequential damages excluded?

Is there a requirement for any of the parties to provide a corporate guarantee or any other financial guarantee?
Detail, where appropriate, obligations and amounts covered.

Is there an insurance clause? 
Detail what insurance is required, amounts and if it is required to provide once a certified year.
Has the content of the clause been reviewed by the Department of Insurance?

Is there a force majeure clause in the contract? 
Detail its content (notice period, duration and period to be able to terminate the contract, etc.).
Is there a Law Change clause? Detail, where appropriate, implications and who assumes the obligations arising from it.
Is there a hardship clause in the contract? Detail its contents.
What is the Law applicable to the contract?
In the event of discrepancy between the parties when applying the contract, which courts or arbitration are competent?

Detail the points of the amendments that is being reviewed that imply an improvement or a worsening with respect to the original contract or with respect to the previous addenda signed (if applicable).
